attention2.ptxt: Do not disassembly inlet throttle valve.

s1.ptxt: Connect SUZUKI scan tool to data link connector (DLC) with ignition switch OFF.
Check that no abnormality is detected in ECM.
Turn ignition switch to ON position and select menu “Electronic Throttle Control” under “MISC TEST” mode of SUZUKI scan tool. Follow the instructions indicated on the SUZUKI scan tool.

attention3.ptxt: For further details, refer to the operator’s manual for SUZUKI scan tool.

s1.ptxt: Confirm the inlet throttle valve operates five times. If inlet throttle valve does nit operate, replace inlet throttle valve referring to Inlet Throttle Valve Removal and Installation:F9Q .

attention2.ptxt: When replacing inlet throttle valve, perform “Initialize inlet throttle valve data” mode of SUZUKI scan tool referring to Inlet Throttle Valve Data Initialization:F9Q .
